gpt_comment: The weather in Brussels will generally be sunny, with temperatures averaging 23.4°C, peaking to 28°C and dipping to 17°C. There's no indication of any rain, perfect for a leisurely stroll in the park. It's a typical summer day, maybe even warm enough for monkeys at the zoo to enjoy an ice cream!
